LanguageData.Kind.degreeDatas.1.description.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. {PAWN_pronoun} never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also never judges people by their appearance. {PAWN_possessive} agreeableness also makes {PAWN_objective} more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
